## Description The image is a logo featuring the brand name "KÄRCHER." The text is in bold, uppercase letters. The font is sans-serif, and the color of the text is black. The background is yellow, creating a high contrast with the text. Below the brand name, there is a black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The overall design is simple and clean, emphasizing the brand name. ## K 4 FJ HOME Der K 4 FJ Home ist ideal für die regelmäßige Reinigung bei mittelstarken Verschmutzungen an Autos sowie Wegen und Flächen rund ums Haus. Inkl. Home Kit & Schaumdüse. ## Description The image displays a pressure washer set, which includes several components: - **Pressure Washer Unit**: - The main body is predominantly yellow with black accents. - It features a handle for easy transportation. - There are wheels at the base for mobility. - **Accessories**: - **Surface Cleaner**: A circular attachment with a handle, designed for cleaning flat surfaces. - **Spray Gun**: A handheld device for directing the water spray. - **Hose**: A coiled black hose for water supply. - **Lances**: Two different lances for varied spray patterns and pressure levels. - **Detergent Bottles**: Two bottles of cleaning solution, one with a yellow label and the other with a blue label. - **Foam Nozzle**: A small attachment for applying detergent. The set is designed for efficient cleaning of outdoor surfaces, vehicles, and other items requiring high-pressure water cleaning. The color scheme is primarily yellow and black, which is common for such equipment. ## Key-Value Pair Bestell-Nr.: 1.679-562.0 ## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4066529155894
Stromart V / Hz 220 - 240 / 50 - 60
Druck bar 20 - max. 130
Fördermenge l/h max. 420
Flächenleistung m²/h 30
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung W 1800
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 5,7
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 11,7
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 302 × 346 × 872
## Ausstattung
Feature Details
Home Kit Flächenreiniger T 5, Stein- und Fassadenreiniger, 3in1, 1 l
Strahlrohrverlängerung [ ]
Schaumdüse [ ]
Reinigungsmittel Autoshampoo 3-in-1 RM 610
Hochdruckpistole G 180 Q
Vario Power Jet [x]
Dreckfräser [x]
HD-Schlauch 6 m
Reinigungsmittel-einsatz über Ansaugung
Integrierter Wasserfilter [x]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [x]
## Description The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with a blue and white color scheme. The top part of the emblem reads "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" in white text on a blue background. Below this, there is a stylized trophy icon in the center, which is gold and white. Underneath the circular emblem, there is a rectangular section with the text "RECORD HOLDER" in white on a gold background. The overall design signifies an official recognition by Guinness World Records for holding a record. ## Description of Figure The image is a graphic representation with a bold, prominent number "1" on the left side, partially shaded in gray. Adjacent to this number, on a bright yellow background, is the text: - **WORLD'S NO. 1 PRE-SLICE SANDWICH BRAND** This text is centered within the yellow area, emphasizing the brand's claim of being the top pre-sliced sandwich brand globally. The use of contrasting colors (gray, yellow, and black) highlights the message, making it visually striking and easy to read. ## Description The image is a logo featuring the colors of the German flag, which are black, red, and yellow, arranged in a stylized, angular design. Below the flag design, the text "Made in Germany" is prominently displayed. The flag colors are arranged horizontally, with black on top, red in the middle, and yellow at the bottom. The design is simple and modern, emphasizing the origin of the product or service as being from Germany. The text is in a clear, sans-serif font, ensuring readability. ## Description of Figure The image is a graphical representation with a black background and yellow elements. It features a stylized icon that appears to depict a power plug or electrical symbol. Above the plug, there is a lightning bolt, suggesting an association with electricity or power. Below the icon, there is text that reads `+100% POWER`, indicating an increase or enhancement in power, possibly related to the context of the figure. The use of yellow and black colors typically signifies caution or attention, often used in contexts related to electricity or energy. The overall design suggests a focus on power enhancement or efficiency, possibly in a technical or engineering context. ## Description The image is a symbol or icon labeled "VARIO POWER." It features a stylized depiction of a pressure washer nozzle. The nozzle is shown with an arrow pointing to the right, indicating the direction of the spray. Above the nozzle, there is a circular arrow with a plus sign, suggesting adjustable power or pressure settings. The background is black, and the elements are in yellow, providing high contrast for visibility. This icon likely represents a feature on a pressure washer that allows the user to vary the power or intensity of the water spray.

chunks.text:
## Description

The image is a logo featuring the brand name "KÄRCHER." The text is in bold, uppercase letters. The font is sans-serif, and the color of the text is black. The background is yellow, creating a high contrast with the text. Below the brand name, there is a black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The overall design is simple and clean, emphasizing the brand name.

## K 4 FJ HOME

Der K 4 FJ Home ist ideal für die regelmäßige Reinigung bei mittelstarken Verschmutzungen an Autos sowie Wegen und Flächen rund ums Haus. Inkl. Home Kit & Schaumdüse.

## Description

The image displays a pressure washer set, which includes several components:

- **Pressure Washer Unit**: 
  - The main body is predominantly yellow with black accents.
  - It features a handle for easy transportation.
  - There are wheels at the base for mobility.

- **Accessories**:
  - **Surface Cleaner**: A circular attachment with a handle, designed for cleaning flat surfaces.
  - **Spray Gun**: A handheld device for directing the water spray.
  - **Hose**: A coiled black hose for water supply.
  - **Lances**: Two different lances for varied spray patterns and pressure levels.
  - **Detergent Bottles**: Two bottles of cleaning solution, one with a yellow label and the other with a blue label.
  - **Foam Nozzle**: A small attachment for applying detergent.

The set is designed for efficient cleaning of outdoor surfaces, vehicles, and other items requiring high-pressure water cleaning. The color scheme is primarily yellow and black, which is common for such equipment.

## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4066529155894
Stromart V / Hz 220 - 240 / 50 - 60
Druck bar 20 - max. 130
Fördermenge l/h max. 420
Flächenleistung m²/h 30
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung W 1800
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 5,7
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 11,7
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 302 × 346 × 872

## Ausstattung
Feature Details
Home Kit Flächenreiniger T 5, Stein- und Fassadenreiniger, 3in1, 1 l
Strahlrohrverlängerung [ ]
Schaumdüse [ ]
Reinigungsmittel Autoshampoo 3-in-1 RM 610
Hochdruckpistole G 180 Q
Vario Power Jet [x]
Dreckfräser [x]
HD-Schlauch 6 m
Reinigungsmittel-einsatz über Ansaugung
Integrierter Wasserfilter [x]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [x]

## Description

The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with a blue and white color scheme. The top part of the emblem reads "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" in white text on a blue background. Below this, there is a stylized trophy icon in the center, which is gold and white. 

Underneath the circular emblem, there is a rectangular section with the text "RECORD HOLDER" in white on a gold background. The overall design signifies an official recognition by Guinness World Records for holding a record.

## Description of Figure

The image is a graphic representation with a bold, prominent number "1" on the left side, partially shaded in gray. Adjacent to this number, on a bright yellow background, is the text:

- **WORLD'S NO. 1 PRE-SLICE SANDWICH BRAND**

This text is centered within the yellow area, emphasizing the brand's claim of being the top pre-sliced sandwich brand globally. The use of contrasting colors (gray, yellow, and black) highlights the message, making it visually striking and easy to read.

## Description

The image is a logo featuring the colors of the German flag, which are black, red, and yellow, arranged in a stylized, angular design. Below the flag design, the text "Made in Germany" is prominently displayed. The flag colors are arranged horizontally, with black on top, red in the middle, and yellow at the bottom. The design is simple and modern, emphasizing the origin of the product or service as being from Germany. The text is in a clear, sans-serif font, ensuring readability.

## Description of Figure

The image is a graphical representation with a black background and yellow elements. It features a stylized icon that appears to depict a power plug or electrical symbol. Above the plug, there is a lightning bolt, suggesting an association with electricity or power.

Below the icon, there is text that reads `+100% POWER`, indicating an increase or enhancement in power, possibly related to the context of the figure. The use of yellow and black colors typically signifies caution or attention, often used in contexts related to electricity or energy. 

The overall design suggests a focus on power enhancement or efficiency, possibly in a technical or engineering context.

## Description

The image is a symbol or icon labeled "VARIO POWER." It features a stylized depiction of a pressure washer nozzle. The nozzle is shown with an arrow pointing to the right, indicating the direction of the spray. Above the nozzle, there is a circular arrow with a plus sign, suggesting adjustable power or pressure settings. The background is black, and the elements are in yellow, providing high contrast for visibility. This icon likely represents a feature on a pressure washer that allows the user to vary the power or intensity of the water spray.
